pkgmetadata.longdescription: wavefront-cli=========================.. image:: https://travis-ci.com/wavefrontHQ/wavefront-cli.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.com/wavefrontHQ/wavefront-cliThe Wavefront Integration Command Line Interface (CLI) is a utility for installing and configuring the Wavefront proxy, Telegraf collector agent, and integrations.
